segments.text: This indoor kitchen view shows a typical family moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's attention is all on drying that single plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Faucet's running full blast, sink overflowing onto the front.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's stepping in the growing puddle without a care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Cabinets below are getting drenchedâ€” what a needless waste.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To the left, upper cabinets hang open with the cookie jar inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy balances precariously on the two-step stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His reach is extended, one hand in the jar, the other on a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool tilts back, inches from disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl stands ready, arm up for her cookie reward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their mischief contrasts the woman's calm routine so sharply.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside the window, the garden path looks inviting and safe.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but smile at the kids' determination.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet the whole setup screams potential accident.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a reminder of how quickly things can go wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR
